articles.title: KPA Mission Statement on US-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
KPA Mission Statement on US-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers are finally launching the DPRK-targeted Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military maneuvers in disregard of the national agreement and the Armistice Agreement.
					 In this regard, the Panmunjom mission of the Korean People's Army released the following statement on Sunday:
					
					 As already planned, the huge armed forces of the U.S. imperialist aggressor army and the south Korean puppet army went into combat readiness against the DPRK. Nuclear aircraft carrier and other groups for naval operations were deployed in the waters around south Korea. Flying corps for attack including strategic bombers are on a standby to go into action according to their aggression war method mainly based on air warfare. 
					
					 Such dangerous military maneuvers pose a serious challenge to the demand and desire of all Koreans to defuse the tension on the Korean Peninsula and bring about a new turn for independent reunification, peace and prosperity. 
					
					 The present situation clearly shows why the south Korean group of traitors intentionally brought to rupture the preliminary talks for north-south high-level military talks, provided with much efforts to ease the military tension on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 Under this situation, the Panmunjom mission of the KPA, upon authorization, clarifies the principled stand of the army and people of the DPRK:
					
					1. Since they announced that Key Resolve and Foal Eagle are aimed to "destroy" the system of the DPRK in "contingency" its army and people will go into an all-out offensive to put an end to the U.S. imperialists' military occupation of south Korea and the anti-popular ruling system of the group of traitors.
					
					 It is a daydream of a fool to hope for "contingency" and "collapse" of the Korean-style socialist system, chosen and built by our people themselves.
					
					 Such tragicomic fancy can be harbored only by the ignorant knowing nothing about our army and people.
					
					 There will be only world-startling great changes and miracles in the DPRK which is dashing toward the eminence of a thriving nation by dint of single-minded unity.
					
					 It is quite natural for the army and people of the DPRK to go into an all-out offensive to finally destroy those daringly challenging its dignified socialist system. 
					
					  2. Now that it has been revealed that the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military maneuvers are to examine the practicability of the adventurous "plan on local war" against the DPRK, the army and people of the DPRK will respond to reckless provocation by the aggressors with an all-out war at any time.
					
					 The "plan on local war" of the U.S. imperialists and the group of traitors is an anti-DPRK scenario worked out allegedly to cope with "provocation of different types" from someone.
					
					 This plan is a product of the U.S. imperialists' cunning strategy to weaken and bring down their rival through continued military provocation and pressure.
					
					 The DPRK has the unbreakable unity of the army and people around the headquarters of the revolution. All its people, with the matchless revolutionary strong army of Mt. Paektu, are in full readiness to penetrate and destroy any provocation and aggression tactics at a stroke. 
					
					 If the aggressors launch provocation for a "local war" the world will witness unprecedented all-out counteraction on the part of the army and people of the DPRK. It will also see such merciless counteraction as engulfing Seoul in sea of flames, whereby to smash every move for confrontation with unimaginable strategy and tactics.
					
					 3. Since Key Resolve and Foal Eagle are aimed at removal of the DPRK's nuclear weapons and missile, its army and people will counter the nuclear blackmail by the aggressors with our own nuclear deterrent and their missile threat with our own missile striking method.
					
					 The reality proves that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean group of traitors are the very one spoiling the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula as they hurl all sorts of nuclear attack means, including group of warships loaded with nukes and corps of strategic bombers, in south Korea and its vicinity under the pretext of the said joint military maneuvers to pose a nuclear threat to the DPRK.
					
					 It also fully reveals that the present U.S. administration's call for nuclear-free world is nothing but a showy signboard.
					
					 As been already declared, the army and people of the DPRK will return bolstered nuclear deterrent of our own style for the continued nuclear threat by the aggressors and our own missile striking action for their vicious attempt to eliminate our missiles.
					
					 Peace is of value to the DPRK. Detente is also what it steadily desires and needs.
					
					 However, its army and people will take resolute military counteractions now that the U.S. imperialists and the group of traitors responded to the DPRK-proposed wide-ranging dialogue and negotiations for peace and detente with military actions for aggression.

articles.title: KPA Warning to S. Korean Military for Psywar
articles.content:
KPA Warning to S. Korean Military for Psywar
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean group of traitors are nowadays getting hell-bent on the anti-DPRK psychological warfare, driving the situation of the Korean Peninsula to overall confrontation.
					 The group let 25 anti-DPRK conservative organizations, including the "Federation of Movement for Freedom in the North", scatter by big balloons hundreds of thousands of leaflets, USB and DVD containing corrupt animation files, foul pamphlets and one dollar notes in direction of the north side's area from the Rimjin Pavilion around the great holiday of the Korean nation.
					
					 In the past the group used to assert that the authorities had nothing to do with such scattering by civilian conservative organizations. But, this time it made wicked lawmakers from the "Grand National Party" involved in the warfare, revealing that north-south confrontation is its "state policy".
					
					 In the meantime, the south Korean puppet military did not hesitate to commit such unpardonable crime as letting balloons carrying baskets of clothes, rotten videos and books fly to the areas of the DPRK side. 
					
					 Anyhow, the group of traitors is seriously mistaken. 
					
					 It seeks to undermine the socialist system in the DPRK, which displays its dignity by dint of single-minded unity and Songun, and waver its army and people's faith with mobilization of such human scum and foul things. But this is a foolish daydream that can never be realized. 
					
					 The group's more persistent psychological warfare is timed to coincide with Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises to be staged by the U.S. imperialists and south Korea against the DPRK.
					
					 In this regard the head of the north side delegation to the inter-Korean general-level military talks on Sunday pointed to the ongoing psychological warfare by the south Korean puppet military authorities and sent the following notice clarifying the Korean People's Army's principled stand: 
					
					 The on-going psychological warfare by the puppet military in the frontline area is a treacherous deed and a wanton challenge to the demand of the times and desire of all the fellow countrymen to bring about a new phase of peaceful reunification and national prosperity through all-round dialogue and negotiations. 
					
					 We officially notify that our army will stage a direct fire at the Rimjin Pavilion and other sources of the anti-DPRK psychological warfare to destroy them on the principle of self-defence, if such actions last despite our repeated warning. 
					
					 The group of traitors in south Korea must stop the anti-DPRK psychological warfare at once, squarely seeing the seriousness of prevailing situation.

articles.title: Key Resolve Joint Military Exercises Blasted
articles.content:
Key Resolve Joint Military Exercises Blasted
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The United States and the south Korean authorities are planning to stage the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises across south Korea from February 28. 
					  These exercises, being staged every year from 2008, fully contain the offensive nature of their predecessors, the Team Spirit joint military exercises and the Reception, Staging, Onward Movement and Integration (RSOI) which were aimed to invade the DPRK.
					
					The Team Spirit joint military exercises started in 1976 and then were escalated. They were strongly protested by the people at home and abroad for they had been staged under the simulated condition of invading the DPRK with involvement of Lance missile, A-4, B-52 and other nuclear striking means.
					
					 The RSOI, aimed at rapid deployment of the U.S. reinforcement in case of emergency on the Korean Peninsula, escalated in parallel with the Foal Eagle, big field mobile exercises, from 2002.
					
					 In 2007 the U.S. and the south Korean authorities decided to change the RSOI into one whose operation is controlled by the south Korean puppet army and call the exercises Key Resolve from next year. 
					
					 After all, those joint military exercises include all spheres of war such as combined commanding and field mobile exercises. And involved in them are high-level administrative organs, civilian facilities, reserve forces and police.
					
					 Japan's "Self-Defense Forces" are expected to take part in the exercises this year. 
					
					 Different circles of south Korea are rejecting the assertion of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean authorities that Key Resolve and Foal Eagle are annual exercises for defence. They contend that the exercises are for preemptive attack on the DPRK in view of their precedent and contents.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Visits Construction Site of Huichon Power Station
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Visits Construction Site of Huichon Power Station 
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Premier Choe Yong Rim acquainted himself with the construction of the Huichon Power Station on the spot on Feb. 23 and 24.
					 Going round the Ryongrim Dam, waterway tunnel and the construction sites of the generator rooms of power stations No. 1 and 2, he heard in detail on the implementation of the instructions given by General Secretary Kim Jong Il when giving field guidance to the power stations and the problems arising in pushing ahead with the project.
					
					 A consultation of officials concerned was held on the spot.
					
					 The problems arising in finishing the construction of the Huichon Power Station ahead schedule were discussed there.
					
					 It stressed the need for all the officials and builders to provide the quality of construction on the best level as required by the method of construction. 
					
					 There was a full organization for the Cabinet, and units related including commissions, ministries and national institutions to produce and provide in time equipment and materials.

articles.title: Grand March of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Grand March of Youth and Students Held
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- An oath-taking grand march of youth and students was held on Sunday to carry through the tasks set forth in a congratulatory message of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea to the Songun Meeting of Youth for General Mobilization and respond to an appeal adopted at the meeting. 
					 Present there were officials of the youth league, the participants in the meeting and youth and students in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 A meeting for starting the march took place at Kim Il Sung Square. 
					
					 An appeal to all the young people across the country was read out there. 
					
					 Then, the march of youth and students started.
					
					 The marchers took to street, holding placards reading "Let us become youth heroes in the worthwhile struggle for glorifying the era of Kim Jong Il!", "Bring about a decisive turn in the improvement of the people's standard of living and the building of a great, prosperous and powerful country by accelerating the development of light industry once again this year!", etc. and flying red flags. 
					
					 Youth league flag procession, brass band procession and other processions of marchers advanced in fine array, singing such songs as "We Are Successors to the Revolution" and "Higher and Faster". 
					
					 Pyongyangites warmly welcomed the marchers along streets.

articles.title: Photo Session of Participants in Songun Meeting
articles.content:
Photo Session of Participants in Songun Meeting
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The participants of the Songun Meeting of Youth for General Mobilization had a photo session on Sunday.
					 Present at the session were senior party, state and army officials.

articles.title: Libraries on Construction Off Press
articles.content:
Libraries on Construction Off Press
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The Industrial Publishing House of the DPRK brought out libraries on construction.
					 The libraries consist of six kinds and 17 volumes. 
					
					 These books are of national value as they comprehend in a systematic way the achievements and experience gained in construction under the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as well as data on latest building science and technology.  
					
					 They are divided into architectural engineering, hydraulic construction, traffic construction, building materials, network of technical facilities and architecture. 
					
					 "Library of Architectural Engineering" (six volumes) deals with dynamic theories for design of various materials and structural analysis of buildings, structural design and building methods of foundation and bedding. 
					
					 "Library of Hydraulic Engineering" (two volumes) contains the theories on the applied hydraulics and basic principles of calculation and the survey and master plan, design, building and management for construction of a hydropower station.
					
					 "Library of Traffic Construction" has four volumes on building of bridge, road, railway, etc. 
					
					 "Library of Building Materials" (three volumes) and "Library of Network of Technical Facilities" contain universal concepts on producing and using various materials, building establishments and planning programs.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Fabricating "Kanghwa Island Treaty"
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Fabricating "Kanghwa Island Treaty" 
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The History Society of the DPRK Saturday released a statement disclosing the truth about the Japanese aggressors' fabrication of the criminal "Kanghwa Island Treaty" and its consequences 135 years since it was cooked up. 
					 According to the statement, the "Unyo-maru" incident in 1875 was used as a pretext for fabricating the treaty as it was a product of the "theory of conquest of Korea by force of arms" and the brigandish policy on "diplomacy for the conquest of Korea" advocated by the bellicose Japanese reactionary ruling quarters after Meiji Restoration.
					
					 In the middle of the 19th century, Japan adopted the policy on "diplomacy for the conquest of Korea" as soon as it embarked upon the road of efflorescence through "Meiji Restoration". It was the policy of aggression aimed to launch a provocation for aggression and armed invasion by imposing the sinister diplomatic document (Sogye) calling for new negotiations for "the resumption of diplomatic relations" between Korea and Japan upon the feudal government of the Ri Dynasty. Its objective was to conquer Korea and turn it into its colony.
					
					 Pursuant to the above-said policy, the Japanese aggressors provoked the "Unyo-maru" incident in 1875.
					
					 Japanese warship "Unyo-maru" illegally intruded into the waters off Chojijin of Kanghwa Island, the territorial waters of Korea, without any prior notice and the hoisting of the national flag of Japan under the pretext of obtaining drinking water during its voyage in September of 1875. It met shelling for self-defence by Korean soldiers.
					
					 This was a premeditated conspiratorial case orchestrated by Japan to secure a pretext for armed invasion of Korea from its outset.
					
					 As the truth behind the incident was known to the public and its criminal nature revealed, the Japanese government advanced a "diplomatic policy for peaceful negotiations", a version of the policy on "diplomacy for the conquest of Korea by force of arms", in November that year. It made a proposal for imposing the shackling "Friendship Treaty of Trade" upon the feudal government of the Ri Dynasty.
					
					 The wild ambition of Japan to invade and dominate Korea by leaving no means and methods untried was more saliently revealed in the course of the negotiations with the Korean feudal government in the subsequent period.
					
					 The "Kanghwa Island Treaty" was an unequal one forced upon Korea by the Japanese aggressors through high-handed military threat and blackmail and cunning intrigues from A to Z.
					
					 It was an entirely aggressive and shackling one as it granted the Japanese side every favorable condition and privilege for invading Korea while imposing on the Korean feudal government only subjugation and obligations. 
					
					 It was also a criminal one that blocked the independent development of the Korean society and paved the way for the large-scale invasion of Korea by European and U.S. capitalist powers.
					
					 The treaty was a criminal treaty as it hampered Korea's independent development and indicated a way favorable for the Japanese aggressors' colonial domination over it by deliberately stipulating a privileged position and rights to invade Korea in the future. 
					
					 As shown by the contents of the treaty, it was an unequal one which granted the Japanese aggressors a unilateral privilege such as the right to free trade, the right to free navigation in coastal waters, the right to survey, extraterritorial rights, the right to consul presence, the right to conclude a supplementary treaty, etc.  while forcing only subjugation and obligations upon the Korean people.   
					
					 By the strength of the "Kanghwa Island Treaty" the Japanese aggressors deprived the federal government of the Ri Dynasty of huge colonial concessions, laying a foundation for realizing their wild ambition for unchallenged domination over Korea. As a result, Korea was gradually reduced to a colony of Japan. 
					
					 The criminal nature of the treaty also found its expression in that it set the stage for large-scale invasion of Korea by European and U.S. powers which watched for a chance of aggression, turning it into a theatre of competition by capitalist powers. 
					
					 Right after the conclusion of the treaty, the U.S. led other aggressor forces in the invasion of Korea. 
					
					 The U.S. realized the Korea-U.S. negotiations by using the Qing Dynasty and concluded the aggressive and unequal "Korea-U.S. Treaty" in 1882.
					
					 The "Korea-U.S. Treaty" helped make a framework of justification for European powers to invade Korea with the involvement of the Qing Dynasty and provisions of the treaty for aggression. It was a curtain-raiser to invading Korea. 
					
					 After the conclusion of the "Kanghwa Island Treaty" by Japan, UK, Germany, France, Czarist Russia and other European powers made their ways to Korea one after another to impose unequal treaties upon the government of the Ri Dynasty.  
					
					 Korea thus turned into a theatre for aggressors' competition, deepening the national crisis. 
					
					 The fabrication of the "Kanghwa Island Treaty" was an unpardonable act of aggression as the crafty and vicious Japanese aggressors wantonly violated the Korean nation's sovereignty and an unprecedented crime as it turned Korea into a theater of European capitalist aggressor forces' operations to conquer it. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are going reckless, persistently pursuing their hostile policy toward the DPRK and stepping up the moves to stage a comeback to Korea, instead of honestly reflecting on the hideous crimes committed by Japan against the Korean people in the past and apologizing for them.
					
					 These are, however, nothing but rash actions perpetrated by them oblivious of the lesson taught by their past. 
					
					 The Korean people learned the historical truth that they can defend neither the nation's dignity nor the country's sovereignty when a country is weak in military muscle. They will surely force Japan, the sworn enemy, to settle all its past crimes under the banner of Songun and fully pay for the blood shed by them in the past without fail.

articles.title: Unequal Treaty for Invasion of Korea
articles.content:
Unequal Treaty for Invasion of Korea
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- It is the 135th anniversary of the "Kanghwa Island Treaty" today.
					 Japan, entering the road of capitalism through the "Meiji Restoration" in 1868, launched on an aggression on Korea, prompted by the "theory of the conquest of Korea" for Japan's prosperity.
					
					 After finding out an excuse for invading Korea through the "Unyo-maru" incident in 1875, Japan sent its troops again to Kanghwa Island in January 1876 and coerced the Korean feudal government with shelling into signing the treaty.   
					
					 The 12-point treaty containing Japan's unreasonable demand was concluded forcibly in February.
					
					 The treaty provided Japan with such conditions for subjugating Korea in political, economic and military aspects as the rights to consul residence, extraterritoriality, exemption from customs duties and coastal waters measurement.
					
					 The lopsided treaty is an illegal and invalid document running counter to international law and norms of international relations and infringing upon the sovereignty and interests of Korea.
					
					 The crimes Japan committed after forcibly concluding the treaty and invading Korea have always been kept in the memory of the Korean people.

articles.title: US Seeks to Justify Anti-DPRK War Exercises
articles.content:
US Seeks to Justify Anti-DPRK War Exercises
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Walter Sharp, commander ofthe U.S. forces in south Korea, said in an interviewed with a U.S.military paper on February 23 that there may be a small local provocation by the DPRK without advance notice, according to south Korea's Yonhap News.
					 His remarks reflected the scheme of the U.S. which is clamoring about "additional provocation" by the DPRK only to find a pretext for justifying Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises.  
					
					 On February 18 the commander-in-chief of the U.S. armed forces in the Pacific region claimed that there would be "additional provocation" the DPRK within several months and that the forthcoming joint military rehearsals are defensive ones to deter a war. 
					
					 Earlier, the administrator of the U.S. State Intelligence Agency told at the House of Representatives that the DPRK may attempt "additional provocation". 
					
					 The United States is now instigating the south Korean authorities to confrontation and war while planning to stage Key Resolve and Foal Eagle with involvement of huge armed forces including nuclear aircraft carrier. 
					
					 The assertion of Walter Sharp cannot be construed otherwise than an attempt to justify the military exercises going against the trend of the times toward prevention of war on the Korean Peninsula and peace and stability.

articles.title: S. Korea Schemes to Intensify Reserve Forces' Drill
articles.content:
S. Korea Schemes to Intensify Reserve Forces' Drill
						
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Defense Ministry seeks to intensify military exercises of the reserve forces from this year, according to Yonhap News of south Korea on Feb. 24.
					 That day the puppet military authorities announced a guideline on "reserve forces' drill to be changed from 2011", which states that sharp-shooting drill of the reserve forces will be staged to cope with street battle, etc. and 30,000 snipers of those forces will be trained and maintained.
					
					 They have also planned to commit two-side exercises for increasing combat capability of the reserve forces as well as drill for deploying some precision replacements to the forefront.

articles.title: Wrongdoings of Authorities Criticized in S. Korea
articles.content:
Wrongdoings of Authorities Criticized in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea in a commentary on Feb. 24 protested the police authorities for blocking rallies and demos.
					 The commentary charged that the police authorities disallowed political parties and civic and social organization to hold rally and demonstration under unreasonable pretext of possible traffic trouble.
					
					 The non-permission is truly intended to keep Chongwadae from hearing the public voice critical of the present authorities and the "Grand National Party", it said.
					
					 After the emergence of the present regime the economy collapsed, democracy deteriorated and the inter-Korean relations went back to irrevocable phase, it noted.
					
					 It urged the police not to infringe upon the freedom of assembly and demonstration, basic rights of the people, in an effort to fawn on the power.
					
					 The spokesman also issued a commentary on Feb. 23 to criticize the authorities for having fostered irregularities and corruption through the project for improving four big rivers.

articles.title: Prosecution's Repression Censured in S. Korea
articles.content:
Prosecution's Repression Censured in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The People's Solidarity for the Repeal of the "National Security Law" in south Korea in a statement on Feb. 24 accused the prosecution of demanding a warrant of arrest for Yun Ki Jin, former chairman of the South Headquarters of the National Alliance of Youth and Students for the Country's Reunification.
					 Yun is now behind bars on charge of violation of the NSL.
					
					 The statement expressed wrath at such impudent attempt of the prosecution authorities to remand Yun who is to be set free at the expiration of his jail term.
					
					 The prosecution authorities will have to pay dear price for their desperate efforts to maintain the NSL, an evil law that should be repealed, it warned.

articles.title: Doings of "Government" Criticized in S. Korea
articles.content:
Doings of "Government" Criticized in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Pak Ji Won, floor leader of the Democratic Party of south Korea, said on Feb. 24 that even a day has not passed with ease in south Korea under the Lee Myung Bak "government", according to KBS of south Korea.
					 Over the past three years since the emergence of the present "government", everything has gone bankrupt and the times have gone back to those of the "Yusin" and "Fifth Republic", he charged
					
					 Democracy retrograded due to the "government's" control over media, the relations between the south and the north went bankrupt and the financial crisis is impending with increase of debt, he said, adding that Lee's implementation of his commitments is estimated at zero.

articles.title: NDC Inspection Group's Statement (2) Reported in S. Korea
articles.content:
NDC Inspection Group's Statement (2) Reported in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- CBS of south Korea reported that the inspection group of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK, in its Feb. 23 statement on revealing truth behind Yonphyong Island shelling, reclarified its stand that the shelling was to cope with the south side's shelling. 
					 In the statement the NDC inspection group stressed that it sent a telephone message to the south side at 8:00 on Nov. 23 last year, prompted by its hope to avert a military conflict and preserve peace, but the south side launched shelling first, the report said.

articles.title: Projected US-S. Korea's Military Exercises Denounced in Britain
articles.content:
Projected US-S. Korea's Military Exercises Denounced in Britain
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- British organizations in a joint statement on Feb. 22 condemned the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises for aggression to be staged by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet army.
					 They included the Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					
					 The exercises to be staged with huge armed forces of the U.S. and south Korea are an intolerable challenge to the DPRK and an action of seriously threatening peace and security in Northeast Asia, the statement pointed out.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces are now rendering the situation extremely tense as they did last year, it noted, adding:
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle, which will aggravate the situation of the Korean Peninsula, are a threat not only to the sovereignty of the DPRK but also to the world peace.
					
					 We demand that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces stop at once the joint military drills and threat to the DPRK.
					
					 We call on the world peace-loving people to turn out in protecting the DPRK, the socialist homeland of Juche.

articles.title: Foreign Papers Celebrate Kim Jong Il's Birthday
articles.content:
Foreign Papers Celebrate Kim Jong Il's Birthday
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of different countries carried special write-ups in celebration of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The Feb. 17th issue of the British paper Independent Star carried special write-ups with a photo of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero, and a photo of Kim Jong Il giving field guidance to various units of the national economy.
					
					 The paper in an article elaborated on the fact that Kim Jong Il conducted energetic ideo-theoretical activities to enrich the Juche idea and set forth ideo-theoretical principles helpful to having proper understanding of the complicated international issues.
					
					 The Nepalese paper Nepal Weekly in its Feb. 15th issue carried a photo of Kim Jong Il with a feature article on how Kimjongilia came to being and on the facts that this immortal flower has been briskly cultivated across the world.
					
					 The Feb. 17th issue of the Brazilian paper Hora do Povo reported about colorful events held in the DPRK to celebrate the birthday of Kim Jong Il. It elaborated on the great vitality of his Songun politics.
					
					 The Feb. 15th issue of the Mongolian paper Odriin Sonin carried an article praising the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il who is conducting energetic activities for peace and security of the Korean Peninsula and national reunification under the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Celebrations of Kim Jong Il's Birthday Held Abroad
articles.content:
Celebrations of Kim Jong Il's Birthday Held Abroad
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries between Feb. 15 and 19 in celebration of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 They were meetings, photo exhibitions and film shows in Cuba and UK, a lecture in Mexico, a seminar and a film show in Russia and a joint meeting, photo exhibitions and film shows in Laos and Libya.
					
					 The chairman of the Cuban preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung praised Kim Jong Il for having wisely led the revolution and construction under a far-reaching plan to accomplish the Korean revolution with arms true to the idea and leadership of the President.
					
					 The deputy dean of the Faculty of Humanities of National Autonomous University of Mexico stressed that the Korean people having Kim Jong Il at the top posts of the party, state and army would surely build a thriving nation and reunify the country by the dint of Songun and single-minded unity.
					
					 All the successes made by the DPRK in building of socialism and international arena are associated with the august name of Kim Jong Il, said the chairman of the Southwestern Administrative District of Moscow of the Chernobyl Council of Russia. The Korean people will surely attain the goal of building a thriving nation under his leadership, he added.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at a meeting in UK.

articles.title: Greatness of Kim Jong Il Lauded Abroad
articles.content:
Greatness of Kim Jong Il Lauded Abroad
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- A regional body and organizations of various countries posted special write-ups on their Internet homepages in celebration of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions posted an article titled "Leader Kim Jong Il's Distinguished Ideo-theoretical Activities" with his photo on Feb. 22.
					
					 The article said that Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into an invincible socialist power, consolidated the single-minded unity of its society and trained the Korean people to be those strong in idea and faith through his extraordinary ideo-theoretical activities.
					
					 The Socialist Youth Union of Brazil posted a feature article with a photo of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero, on Feb. 16.
					
					 The world knows no such great man as Kim Jong Il who was born of a legendary guerilla family under extraordinary environment, the article said, adding: During the last Korean War he acquired at the table for mapping out plan of operations of the Supreme Command the mysterious tactics of Kim Il Sung who inflicted a crushing defeat on the U.S. boasting of being the "strongest" in the world for the first time in history.
					
					 The Poland-DPRK Association carried a photo of Kim Jong Il and an article on his feats performed to realize the long-cherished desire of the people on Feb. 16.
					
					 The Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea and the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association posted on their joint Internet homepage pictures of Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan secret camp, Jong Il Peak, the monument inscribed with the poem "Bright Star" in the secret camp, Lake Chon on Mt. Paektu, etc.

articles.title: Units in Kuriles to Be Re-equipped with Sophisticated Technical Hardware
articles.content:
Units in Kuriles to Be Re-equipped with Sophisticated Technical Hardware
						
 Moscow, February 25 (KCNA) -- The commander of the Eastern Military District of Russia at a press conference on Feb. 21 declared that those units deployed in the Kuriles would be reequipped with up-to-date technical hardware in two years to come.
					 The Kuriles should be reliably defended as they are the territory of Russia, he said, stressing that those units in the Kuriles should be modern ones capable of carrying out their tasks.
					
					 The Russian army should rapidly and confidently move with clear-cut aims, he said, adding that the induction of latest technical equipment and the modernization of infrastructure in the region are now under way.

articles.title: Territorial Dispute between Russia and Japan--Xinhua
articles.content:
Territorial Dispute between Russia and Japan--Xinhua
 Beijing, February 25 (KCNA) -- The Xinhua News Agency of China released an article titled "Territorial dispute, knot hard to untie in the relations between Russia and Japan" on Feb. 22.
					 Commenting on the Chief Cabinet Secretary of Japan's recent inspection of the Southern Kuriles by air, the agency said that this inspection put emphasis on form and it was aimed to demonstrate Japan's sovereignty over the islands through such symbolic action.
					
					 It noted that Russia would not easily concede on this issue as its right to control the islands is a main part of its overall strategy concerning its Far Eastern region and, furthermore, the Asian- Pacific region.
					
					 It quoted the analysts as saying that in case the Southern Kuriles are returned to Japan, these islands will be used by the U.S. and Japan for deterring Russia militarily and it will be hard for the Russian Pacific Fleet to freely move in the Pacific.

articles.title: China Gives Importance to Leading Public Opinion
articles.content:
China Gives Importance to Leading Public Opinion
						
 Beijing, February 25 (KCNA) -- Li Changchun, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Communist Party of China, on Feb. 22 stressed the need to go well with the work for giving news briefing and leading public opinion.
					 This demand was made in his speech to the participants of the first training course for news spokesmen of party committees across the country under way in Beijing. 
					
					 This year marks the 90th birthday of the CPC and it is the first year for carrying out the 12th Five-Year Plan, he said, underlining the need to steadily conduct this work with high sense of responsibility so as to direct efforts to celebrating the 90th birthday of the CPC, accelerating the scientific development and creating atmosphere for strengthened harmony of society.
					
					 He also called for concentrating efforts on the creation of atmosphere of doing substantial things for popular masses and well doing work with them and building a good international image of China developing in peace.

articles.title: Measures Taken in China to Strengthen Social Management
articles.content:
Measures Taken in China to Strengthen Social Management
 Beijing, February 25 (KCNA) -- China is paying deep attention to social management.
					 Zhou Yongkang, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Communist Party of China and secretary of the Central Commission of Politics and Law, in his speech made at a seminar of leading officials of ministries and departments on social management and innovations on Feb. 20 stressed the need to strengthen the social management and bring about innovations in it.
					
					 He called on the officials to study hard the important speeches of General Secretary Hu Jintao and strengthen social management and bring about innovations in it as required by the new development of economy and society. It is necessary to establish a socialist social management system of Chinese characteristics, consolidate the ruling position of the party and protect the fundamental interests of the people to ensure long-term stability of the country, he added.
					
					 He underlined the need for all the provinces and fields to thoroughly implement the scientific outlook on development and rapidly change the mode of economic development and pay greater attention to the improvement of the people's standard of living and social equality.

articles.title: US Attitude at UNSC under Fire by Palestinian Groups
articles.content:
US Attitude at UNSC under Fire by Palestinian Groups 
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Twenty-eight Palestinian organizations in East Jerusalem decided Wednesday to boycott the U.S. official and non-governmental organizations, in protest against the U.S. veto against an UN anti-Israeli Jewish settlement resolution. 
					The representative of East Jerusalem of Palestine National Liberation Movement (Fatah) clarified this when interviewed by a foreign news agency. He declared Palestine would never roll back this decision before the U.S. apologizes to the Palestinians.

articles.title: No Prospect to Cooperation with NATO--Secretary of CSTO
articles.content:
No Prospect to Cooperation with NATO--Secretary of CSTO
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Nikolai Borzhzya, secretary of the Collective Security Treaty Organization (CSTO), in a press interview on Feb. 21 expressed CSTO's stand toward cooperation with NATO.
					 The organization has no prospect of cooperation with NATO, he said, adding that it, able to perfectly work on its own efforts, would not be subject to any restriction in its activities for no contact with NATO.

articles.title: Iranian Cyber Army Hacks into VOA Website
articles.content:
Iranian Cyber Army Hacks into VOA Website
 Tehran, February 25 (KCNA) -- The Iranian Cyber Army (ICA) Monday hacked into the website of the Voice of America (VOA), replacing its homepage with a message to U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Clinton.
					"Mrs. Clinton, do you want to hear the voice of the oppressed nations' will from heart of USA? The Islamic world doesn't believe USA trickery. We call on you to stop interfering in Islamic countries," the message urged.
					
					 It said the move was made in response to the propaganda conducted by the websites that support the seditious movements in Iran.

articles.title: Resignation of PM Urged in Japan
articles.content:
Resignation of PM Urged in Japan
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The demand for resignation of the Japanese prime minister is growing from among Japanese. 
					 According to a nationwide opinion poll announced by Asahi Shimbun on February 21, 49 percent of the respondents hoped that Prime Minister Naoto Kan would step down as soon as possible, while 30 percent want him to remain in office.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il ve funcion del Conjunto Artistico de las FPIC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il ve funcion del Conjunto Artistico de las FPIC
Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, vio en el Teatro de Arte Ponghwa, recien reconstruido, la funcion de apertura del Conjunto Artistico de las Fuerzas Populares del Interior de Corea (FPIC).
					  Los ejecutantes pusieron en la escena el sexteto mixto y coro "Gloria al querido Dirigente", la cancion con acompanamiento de Oungum y coro "Casa natal cubierta de copos de nieve", el cuarteto femenino y coro "Tendremos en gran estima a nuestro General", el trio de acordeon "Pasos" y otras piezas.
					
					  A traves de la funcion, los ejecutantes manifestaron plenamente el poderio de las FPIC que hacen brillar la tradicion de mas de 60 anos de la defensa a ultranza al Lider y salvaguardar fidedignamente las conquistas de la patria socialista y la tranquilidad del pueblo.
					
					  Ademas, mostraron bien la ferrea conviccion y la voluntad de los militares de las FPIC de defender monoliticamente el regimen socialista centrado en las masas populares.
					
					  Muy satisfecho de que los ejecutantes hayan ofrecido esta magnifica funcion, el Dirigente aprecio altamente el exito de la funcion y les dio agradecimiento.
					
					  El Dirigente vio el historial del Conjunto Artistico y evaluo las proezas de esta entidad, que organizada inmediatamente despues de la liberacion como banda del Departamento del Interior, puso de pleno manifiesto, durante mas de 60 anos que datan de su fundacion, su poderio del destacamento artistico de los militares revolucionarios manteniendo su propio caracteristico y formo en esos dias muchos creadores y artistas talentosos.
					
					  El Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia en la creacion artistica.
					
					  En la ocasion le acompanaron los cuadros directivos de los organos del partido, el Estado y las fuerzas armadas: Kim Jong Un, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Ki Nam, Kim Kyong Hui, Kang Sok Ju, Ju Sang Song, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Yang Gon, Pak To Chun, Thae Jong Su, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang y Kim Chang Sop, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y de las FPIC y los funcionarios de la rama de literatura y arte.

articles.title: EPC hara frente rotundo a los simulacros conjuntos anti-RPDC
articles.content:
EPC hara frente rotundo a los simulacros conjuntos anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con respecto a que los imperialistas norteamericanos y los titeres belicistas surcoreanos dieron inicio por fin a los ejercicios belicos conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dando espaldas a los acuerdos nacionales y al Acuerdo de Armisticio, la representacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea en Phanmunjom hizo publica el dia 27 la siguiente declaracion. 
					Como ya han planificado, enormes fuerzas armadas de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas y el ejercito titere surcoreano entraron en la disposicion de combate contra la RPDC, y los colectivos de operaciones maritimas incluso portaaviones nucleares se emplazaron en las aguas maritimas cerca del Sur de Corea.
					
					Ademas, segun el modo de guerra de agresion de preferencia a la batalla aerea, los cazabombarderos estrategicos y otras aviaciones de ataque estan en espera de salida.
					
					Debido a tales maniobras militares aventureras de los imperialistas norteamericanos y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos, la aspiracion y demanda de toda la nacion de aliviar la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y allanar la nueva era de reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad tropiezan con graves desafios. 
					
					La situacion actual muestra claramente en que reside la verdadera intencion de la banda de los traidores que llevo intencionalmente a la ruptura el dialogo previo para el inicio de las conversaciones militares de alto nivel Norte-Sur, preparado dificilmente para el alivio de tension militar de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					En relacion con la situacion creada, la representacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea en Phanmunjom declara bajo la autorizacion la siguiente posicion de principios de nuestro ejercito y pueblo:
					
					1. Dado que anunciaron sin escrupulos que los ejercicios belicos conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" toman por su objetivo la "situacion bruscamente cambiada" y el "derrumbe" del sistema de alguien, nuestro ejercito y pueblo entraran en la ofensiva general para acabar con la ocupacion militar del Sur de Corea por parte de los imperialistas norteamericanos y llevar al fracaso total el sistema de dominacion antinacional de la banda de los traidores surcoreanos. 
					
					Desear una "contingencia" o "derrumbe" del regimen socialista a nuestro estilo, optado y construido por nuestro pueblo, no pasa de ser un sueno ridiculo de los absurdos, que no saben nada de nuestro ejercito y pueblo, igual a querer la caida del cielo. 
					
					En la RPDC que avanza a galopes hacia la gran potencia prospera con el poderio de la unidad monolitica se registran solamente las innovaciones y milagros seculares que sorprenden a todo el mundo.
					
					Es muy justo que nuestro ejercito y pueblo entren en la ofensiva general para llevar al arruinamiento final a los que se atreven a desafiar a nuestro prestigioso sistema socialista.
					
					2. Puesto que ellos aclararon que los simulacros "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" revisan el caracter real del aventurero "plan de combate local" contra la RPDC, nuestro ejercito y pueblo responderan en cualquier momento con la justa guerra total a las imprudentes provocaciones de los agresores.
					
					El "plan de combate local" de los imperialistas norteamericanos y la banda de traidores surcoreanos es el guion de confrontacion con la RPDC trazado bajo el pretexto de hacer frente a "distintas formas de provocacion" de alguien. 
					
					Ademas, es un producto de la astuta estrategia de EE.UU. de debilitar y derrumbar a la contraparte con incesantes provocaciones militares y presiones. 
					
					Contamos con todo el ejercito y el pueblo unidos compactamente en torno a la Direccion de la Revolucion y con la elevada agudeza de todo el pueblo y el invencible ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu capaz de calar a fondo como ver la palma de la mano cualesquier provocaciones e intrigas agresivas y frustrarlas de un solo golpe.
					
					Si los invasores desatan una provocacion hablando de "combate local", el mundo observara la contramedida total de nuestro ejercito y pueblo, nunca vista, y la represalia despiadada como la de echar Seul en el mar de fuego, en que se hagan anicos todas las maniobras conflictivas por la estrategia y tacticas nunca imaginables. 
					
					3. Como que los ejercicios belicos conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" tienen por su meta eliminar las armas nucleares y misiles de la RPDC, nuestro ejercito y pueblo responderan a los chantajes nucleares de los agresores con el disuasivo nuclear a nuestro estilo, y a la amenaza de misiles con nuestro ataque de misiles a nuestra manera. 
					
					   La realidad comprueba que los imperialistas norteamericanos y la banda de titeres surcoreanos son autores que estorban la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana con el chantaje nuclear contra la RPDC introduciendo en el Sur de Corea y su contorno los colectivos de buques de guerra armados con ojivas nucleares, aviaciones de cazabombarderos estrategicos y otros medios de ataque nuclear, so pretexto de los simulacros militares conjuntos como "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho".
					
					Ademas, revela claramente a todo el mundo que la preconizacion de la actual administracion norteamericana al mundo sin armas nucleares no pasa de ser un rotulo vistoso. 
					
					Apreciamos la paz. Y aspiramos y demandamos invariablemente el alivio de tension. 
					
					Pero, dado que los imperialistas norteamericanos y la banda de traidores surcoreanos desafian con sus acciones militares agresivas a nuestra propuesta de hacer amplio dialogo y negociaciones para la paz y el alivio de la tension, nuestro ejercito y pueblo tomaran rotundas contramedidas militares al respecto.

articles.title: Jefe de delegacion del Norte avisa a la capa militar del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Jefe de delegacion del Norte avisa a la capa militar del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ATCC) -- En estos dias, la banda de traidores surcoreanos lleva a la confrontacion total la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana aferrandose a la intriga psicologica contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  La "Federacion de Movimiento por el Norte Libre" y otras 24 entidades conservadoras anti-RPDC, instigada por la banda traidora, dispersan desde el pabellon Rimjin, en ocasion de la gran fiesta nacional del Norte, cientos de miles de volantes, USB y DVD que registran los datos intrigantes, opusculos malsanos de propaganda, billetes de un dolar USA utilizando grandes globos de goma.
					
					  En particular, en el pasado, la banda traidora hablaba tanto de que el lanzamiento de volantes anti-RPDC de las entidades conservadoras civiles no tenia que ver nada con las autoridades, pero, en la actualidad moviliza hasta los infames "parlamentarios" del "Gran Partido Nacional" para el complot psicologico anti-RPDC, lo cual revela fehacientemente que la confrontacion con el Norte es la politica estatal del Sur de Corea.
					
					  Por otra parte, la capa militar titere despacha a las zonas de nuestra parte los globos con cestos de ropas, videos y libros malsanos. Esto es un crimen imperdonable. 
					
					  Pero, la banda traidora esta muy equivocada. 
					
					  El intento de desintegrar nuestro regimen socialista, potente por el Songun y unido con la unica alma, y de debilitar la conviccion de nuestro ejercito y pueblo, valiendose de las escorias humanas y sucias cosas, no pasa de ser una ilusion vana nunca realizable aunque pasen ciento, mil anos. 
					
					  Con respecto a la campana psicologica anti-RPDC que se torna cada dia mas persistente coincidiendo en tiempo con los ejercicios belicos conjuntos EE.UU.-Sur de Corea "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" de caracter agresivo contra la RPDC, el jefe de nuestra parte a las conversaciones militares a nivel de general Norte-Sur revelo el dia 27 la intriga psicologica de la capa militar titere y le envio el siguiente aviso, que aclara la posicion de principios de nuestro ejercito:
					
					  La campana psicologica de la capa militar titere, que se libra en estos momentos en los alrededores del frente, deviene una traicion a la nacion que contraviene totalmente a la demanda de la epoca y toda la nacion que desea abrir la nueva coyuntura de la reunificacion pacifica y la prosperidad nacional mediante el dialogo integral y negociaciones. 
					
					  Avisamos oficialmente que si siguen tales actos pese a las reiteradas advertencias de nuestra parte, se realizara en el principio de defensa de la soberania el fuego a punteria directa contra las fuentes de intriga psicologica anti-RPDC incluso el pabellon Rimjin.
					
					  Los traidores surcoreanos deben poner de inmediato fin a las intrigas psicologicas anti-RPDC, dandose clara cuenta de la gravedad de la situacion creada.
